Song.title: Before The Throne Of God Above (Simplified)
Song.copyright: Words by Charitie Bancroft Music by Vikki Cook Additional Tag by Shane and Shane

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Before the [D]throne of [G/D]God a[D]bove I have a [D]strong and perfect [F#m]plea A [D/F#]great high [G]Priest [D/F#]whose [A]name is [Bm]love Who ever [G6]lives and [Em7]pleads [G/A]for [D]me My name [F#m7]is [G]gra[D/F#]ven [D]on His [A]hands, [D]My name [F#m7]is [G]writ[D/F#]ten [G]on [A]His [Bm]Heart I [Bm/A]know that [G]while [D/F#]in [A]heav’n He [Bm2 Bm]stands. No [Bm/A]tongue can [G6]bid me [Em7]thence [G/A]de[Bm]part No [Bm/A]tongue can [G6]bid me [Em7]thence [G/A]de[D]part
Verse 2: [D]When Satan [D]tempts me [G/D]to des[D]pair And tells me [D]of the guilt with[F#m]in Up[D/F#]ward I [G]look [D/F#]and [A]see Him [Bm]there Who made an [G6]end of [Em7]all [G/A]my [D]sin Because [F#m7]the [G]sin[D/F#]less [D]Savior [A]died [D]My sin[F#m7]ful [G]soul [D/F#]is [G]count[A]ed [Bm]free For [Bm/A]God, the [G]Just, [D/F#]is [A]satis[Bm2 Bm]fied To [Bm/A]look on [G6]Him and [Em7]par[G/A]don [Bm]me To [Bm/A]look on [G6]Him and [Em7]par[G/A]don [D]me
{new_page} Verse 3: Beh[D]old Him [D]there the [G/D]risen [D]Lamb My perfect [D]spotless righteous[F#m]ness The [D/F#]great un[G]change[D/F#]a[A]ble I [Bm]AM The King of [G6]glory [Em7]and [G/A]of [D]grace One with [F#m7]Him[G]self [D/F#]I [D]cannot [A]die [D]My soul [F#m7]is [G]pur[D/F#]chased [G]by [A]His [Bm]blood My [Bm/A]life is [G]hid [D/F#]with [A]Christ on [Bm2 Bm]high With [Bm/A]Christ my [G6]Savior [Em7]and [G/A]my [Bm]God With [Bm/A]Christ my [G6]Savior [Em7]and [G/A]my [D]God
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 before the throne of god above i have a strong and perfect plea a great high priest whose name is love who ever lives and pleads for me my name is graven on his hands my name is written on his heart i know that while in heavn he stands no tongue can bid me thence depart no tongue can bid me thence depart verse 2 when satan tempts me to despair and tells me of the guilt within upward i look and see him there who made an end of all my sin because the sinless savior died my sinful soul is counted free for god the just is satisfied to look on him and pardon me to look on him and pardon me verse 3 behold him there the risen lamb my perfect spotless righteousness the great unchangeable i am the king of glory and of grace one with himself i cannot die my soul is purchased by his blood my life is hid with christ on high with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god

Arrangement.description: Arrangement from Songs For The Cross-Centered Life
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | C2 | C2 | C2]
Verse 1: Before the thr[C2]one of God above I have a [C2]strong and perfect [Em]plea A great high [F]Priest [C]whose name is [Am]love Who ever [F]lives and pleads [Gsus4]for [C]me My name is gr[F/C]a[C]ven on His [Gsus4 G]hands, My name is wr[F/C]it[C]ten on His [Am]heart I know that [F/C]while [C]in heav’n He [Am]stands. No tongue can [F]bid me thence [Gsus4]de[Am]part No tongue can [F]bid me thence [Gsus4] de[C | Gsus4 | D | F]part
Verse 2: When Satan [C]tempts me [F/C]to des[C]pair And tells me [C]of the guilt with[Em]in Upward I [F]look [C/E]and [G]see Him [Am]there Who [G]made an [F]end of all [Gsus4]my [C]sin Because the [F]sin[C/E]less Savior [Gsus4 G]died My sinful [F]soul [C]is counted [Am]free For [G]God, the [F]Just, [C]is [Gsus]satis[Am]fied To [Am/G]look on [F]Him and par[Gsus4]don [Am]me To [G]look on [F]Him and [Dm]par[G]don [C | G | D | F]me
{new_page} Instrumental: [||: C | G | D | F :|| C | C | C | Csus4]
Verse 3: Behold Him [C/G]there the risen [F/G]Lamb My perfect [C/G]spotless righteous[Em/G]ness The great unch[F/G]angeable I [Am/G]AM The King of [F2/G]glory and of [C]grace One with Him[F]self [C/E]I [C]cannot [Gsus4 G]die My [C]soul is [F]pur[C]chased [Gsus4]by His [Am]blood My life is [F]hid with Christ on [Am]high With Christ my [F]Savior [Dm]and [Gsus4]my [C]God With Christ my [F]Savior [Dm]and [Dm7]my [Am]God With [G]Christ my [F]Savior [Dm]and [G11]my [C | G | D | F | C]God
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 before the throne of god above i have a strong and perfect plea a great high priest whose name is love who ever lives and pleads for me my name is graven on his hands my name is written on his heart i know that while in heavn he stands no tongue can bid me thence depart no tongue can bid me thence depart verse 2 when satan tempts me to despair and tells me of the guilt within upward i look and see him there who made an end of all my sin because the sinless savior died my sinful soul is counted free for god the just is satisfied to look on him and pardon me to look on him and pardon me instrumental verse 3 behold him there the risen lamb my perfect spotless righteousness the great unchangeable i am the king of glory and of grace one with himself i cannot die my soul is purchased by his blood my life is hid with christ on high with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Bm | F#m | G | G :|| Bm | F#m | G | A/C#] [| G/B | G/B | G |G2 | D | D | D | D]
Verse 1: Before the [D]throne of God above I have a [D]strong and perfect [F#m]plea A great high [G]Priest whose name is [Bm]love Who ever [G]lives and pleads for [D]me My name is [G]graven on His [F#m]hands, My name is [Em/D]written on His [Bm/D]heart I know that [G]while in heav’n He [Bm]stands. No tongue can [Em/G]bid me thence de[Bm]part No tongue can [A7sus]bid me thence de[G/D]part [| Dmaj7 | G/D | D]
Verse 2: When Satan [D]tempts me [G/D]to des[D]pair And tells me [D]of the guilt within Upward I [D]look and see Him there Who made an [Em/D]end of all my [D]sin Because the [G]sinless Savior [A]died My sinful [G]soul is counted [Bm]free For God, the [Em]Just, is satis[Bm]fied To look on [G]Him and pardon [Bm]me To look on [Asus]Him and pardon [G (to bridge)]me
{new_page} Bridge: [G | G2 | A2 | A G2/B | G | D/G | D2 | A/D |] [G | D/G | G/C | A/B | D/E | D/F# | G2 | G2]
{key:E} Verse 3: [(Modulate up)]Behold Him [E]there! The [F#m/E]risen [E]Lamb My [A/E]perfect, [E]spotless, [C#m]righteous[B]ness The [E/G#]great un[A]changea[B]ble I [C#m]AM The [G#m]King of [A]glory and [A/B]of [E]grace One with Him[A/E]self I [C#m/E]cannot [B/E]die My [G#m/E]soul is [A/E]purchased [G#m/E]by His [A2]blood My life is [F#m7]hid with Christ on [C#m7]high With Christ my [Dmaj9]Savior and my [A2]God With Christ my [F#m]Savior and my [E]God
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 before the throne of god above i have a strong and perfect plea a great high priest whose name is love who ever lives and pleads for me my name is graven on his hands my name is written on his heart i know that while in heavn he stands no tongue can bid me thence depart no tongue can bid me thence depart verse 2 when satan tempts me to despair and tells me of the guilt within upward i look and see him there who made an end of all my sin because the sinless savior died my sinful soul is counted free for god the just is satisfied to look on him and pardon me to look on him and pardon me bridge verse 3 behold him there the risen lamb my perfect spotless righteousness the great unchangeable i am the king of glory and of grace one with himself i cannot die my soul is purchased by his blood my life is hid with christ on high with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [F/C | C | F/C | C |F C/E Dm7 F/G | C ]
Verse 1: Before the thr[C]one of G[F/C]od ab[C]ove I have a st[C]rong and perfect [Em]plea A great [C/E]high [F]Priest [C/E]whose n[G]ame is [Am]love Who [Am/G]ever [Dm7/F]lives and p[Dm7]leads [F/G]for [C]me My name [Em]is [F]gra[C/E]ven [C]on His [Gsus4 G]hands, [C]My name [Em7]is [F]writ[C/E]ten [F]on [G]His [Am]heart I [Am/G]know that [F]while [C/E]in [G]heav’n He [Am]stands. No to[Am/G]ngue can [Dm7/F]bid me [Dm7]thence [F/G]de[Am]part No to[Am/G]ngue can [Dm7/F]bid me t[Dm7]hence [F/G] de[C]part
Inter: [| F C/E Dm7 F/G | C]
Verse 2: When Satan [C]tempts me [F/C]to des[C]pair And tells me [C]of the guilt with[Em]in Upward [C/E]I [F]look [C/E]and [G]see Him [Am]there Who [Am/G]made an [Dm7/F]end of [Dm7]all [F/G]my [C]sin Because [Em]the [F]sin[C/E]less S[C]avior [Gsus4 G]died [C]My sinf[Em]ul [F]soul [C/E]is c[F]ount[G]ed [Am]free For [Am/G]God, the [F]Just, [C/E]is [G]satis[Am]fied To [Am/G]look on [Dm7/F]Him and [Dm7]par[F/G]don [Am]me To [Am/G]look on [Dm7/F]Him and [Dm7]par[F/G]don [C]me
{new_page}
Turn: [| F/C | C | F C/E Dm7 | Asus | A ]
Verse 3: Behold Him [D]there the r[G/D]isen [D]Lamb My perfect [D]spotless righteous[F#m]ness The g[D/F#]reat unch[G]ange[D/F#]abl[A]e I [Bm]AM The King of [Em7/G]glory [Em7]and [G/A]of [D]grace One with [F#m7]Hims[G]elf [D/F#]I [D]cannot [Asus4 A]die [D]My soul [F#m7]is [G]pur[D/F#]]chased [G]by [A]His [Bm]blood My [Bm/A]life is [G]hid [D/F#]with C[A]hrist on [Bm9]high With [Bm]Christ [Bm/A]my [Em7/G]Savior [Em]and [G/A]my [Bm]God With [Bm/A]Christ my [Em7/G]Savior [Em7]and [G/A]my [D]God With [G]Christ my [F]Savior [Dm]and [G11]my [D]God
End: [G/D | D | G D/F# G/A | D]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 before the throne of god above i have a strong and perfect plea a great high priest whose name is love who ever lives and pleads for me my name is graven on his hands my name is written on his heart i know that while in heavn he stands no tongue can bid me thence depart no tongue can bid me thence depart inter verse 2 when satan tempts me to despair and tells me of the guilt within upward i look and see him there who made an end of all my sin because the sinless savior died my sinful soul is counted free for god the just is satisfied to look on him and pardon me to look on him and pardon me turn verse 3 behold him there the risen lamb my perfect spotless righteousness the great unchangeable i am the king of glory and of grace one with himself i cannot die my soul is purchased by his blood my life is hid with christ on high with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god end

Arrangement.description: With Shane and Shane Tag - key change last verse
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Before the [D]throne of [G/D]God a[D]bove I have a [D]strong and perfect [F#m]plea A [D/F#]great high [G]Priest whose [A]name is [Bm]love Who ever [G6]lives and [Em7]pleads [G/A]for [D]me My name is [G]gra[D]ven on His [A]hands, My name is [G]written on [A]His [Bm]Heart I [Bm/A]know that [G]while [D/F#]in [A]heav’n He [Bm2 Bm]stands. No [Bm/A]tongue can [G6]bid me [Em7]thence [G/A]de[Bm]part No [Bm/A]tongue can [G6]bid me [Em7]thence [G/A]de[D]part
Verse 2: [D]When Satan [D]tempts me [G/D]to des[D]pair And tells me [D]of the guilt with[F#m]in Up[D/F#]ward I [G]look and [A]see Him [Bm]there Who made an [G6]end of [Em7]all [G/A]my [D]sin Because the [G]sin[D]less Savior [A]died My [D/F#]sinful [G]soul is count[A]ed [Bm]free For [Bm/A]God, the [G]Just, [D/F#]is [A]satis[Bm2 Bm]fied To [Bm/A]look on [G6]Him and [Em7]par[G/A]don [Bm]me To [Bm/A]look on [G6]Him and [Em7]par[G/A]don [D]me
Halle[A]lujah, Halle[F#m]lu[Bm]jah Praise the [G]One, Risen [A]Son of [D]God
{new_page}
{key:E} Verse 3: Beh[E]old Him [E]there the [A/E]risen [E]Lamb My perfect [E]spotless righteous[G#m]ness The [E/G#]great un[A]changea[B]ble I [C#m]AM The King of [A6]glory [F#m7]and [A/B]of [E]grace One with Him[A]self [E/G#]I [E]cannot [B]die My [E/G#]soul is [A]purchased by [B]His [C#m]blood My [C#m/B]life is [A]hid [E/G#]with [B]Christ on [C#m2 C#m]high With [C#m/B]Christ my [A6]Savior [F#m7]and [A/B]my [C#m]God With [C#m/B]Christ my [A6]Savior [F#m7]and [A/B]my [E]God
Tag: Halle[B]lujah, Halle[G#m]lu[C#m]jah Praise the [A]One, Risen [B]Son of [E]God
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 before the throne of god above i have a strong and perfect plea a great high priest whose name is love who ever lives and pleads for me my name is graven on his hands my name is written on his heart i know that while in heavn he stands no tongue can bid me thence depart no tongue can bid me thence depart verse 2 when satan tempts me to despair and tells me of the guilt within upward i look and see him there who made an end of all my sin because the sinless savior died my sinful soul is counted free for god the just is satisfied to look on him and pardon me to look on him and pardon me hallelujah hallelujah praise the one risen son of god verse 3 behold him there the risen lamb my perfect spotless righteousness the great unchangeable i am the king of glory and of grace one with himself i cannot die my soul is purchased by his blood my life is hid with christ on high with christ my savior and my god with christ my savior and my god tag hallelujah hallelujah praise the one risen son of god
